attributes.action: UKIP's Nigel Farage NOT to be involved in ALL 2015 General Election televised debates
attributes.additional_details:
Responsible department: Cabinet Office


UKIP are a bunch of wazzoks, get more than their fair share of publicity for a small party and should not be encouraged.

Please sign this petition to keep keep Nigel Farage's ugly mug and abhorent views off the screen as much as possible.

rejection.details: HM Government does not get involved in televised election debates as it could be considered party political material.
